title: Batik Process Samples, 1900–74
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
dimensions: H x W (each): 28 x 24.5 cm (11 x 9 5/8 in.)
description: Set of fourteen cotton pieces showing the step-by-step process of producing batik in Java. Design is of a large winged insect within a geometric border. Dyed in blue and brown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Batik Process Samples, 1900–74.Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave. 1974-9-8-a/n.
